tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WildlifeTracking (
  animal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  animal_name TEXT,
  gps_sensor_id INT,
  latitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  longitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE wildlife_tracking (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_name VARCHAR(50),
    gps_latitude DECIMAL,
    gps_longitude DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_status (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    battery_level DECIMAL,
    last_reported_time TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE wildlife_locations (
	sensor_id INT,
	animal_id INT,
	latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
	longitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
	timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE animals (
	animal_id INT,
	animal_species VARCHAR(50),
	birth_date DATE,
	gender CHAR(1),
	weight DECIMAL(6, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE animals (
    animal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species VARCHAR(50),
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    location_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE movements (
    movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    sensor_id INT,
    movement_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE wildlife_location_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_name VARCHAR(50),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE wildlife_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    animal_id INT,
    sensor_id INT,
    start_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    end_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
